PDF files of peak-labeled, high resolution (<0.17 cm$^{-1}$ ) IR absorption spectra of HCl and DCl. Spectra were collected on a Nicolet Nexus 670 FR-IR in a 10-cm gas cell at a pressure of 20 Torr. The chlorine isotope peaks are resolved to baseline.
